prodNameC: 埃達堤斯過敏原基本檢驗試劑組
ingredientsDesc:
BASIC KIT COMPONENTS:
IgE MICROPLATE coated with anti-IgE. Each well is coated with monoclonal anti-human IgE.
HRP-STREPTAVIDIN CONJUGATE：Each vial contains 13 ml of Streptavidin-Peroxidase conjugate in a red colored buffer, pH 5.5 supplemented with 0.001% Proclin 300.
INCUBATION BUFFER/CALIBRATOR A：Each vial contains 8 ml of TRIS buffer pH8.4, supplemented with 0.005% Proclin300. The incubation buffer of the Basic kit is used as Calibrator A (Conc. 0 KIU/L).
SUBSTRATE HS：Each vial contains 13ml of a ready-to-use stabilized mixture of 3,3,5,5 tetramethylbenzidine and hydrogen peroxide
STOP SOLUTION：Each vial contains 13ml of 0.3M sulphuric acid.
WASH BUFFER 10x：Each vial contains 100ml of a washing solution, concentrated 10x, with Amphoteric. B 2.5 μg/ml.

CALIBRATION SET COMPONENTS:
The vials contain 0.75 ml of human IgE in equine serum and 0.01% Proclin 300. The IgE concentrations are: 0.36-0.72-3.6-18-50-100 KIU/L. The incubation buffer of the Basic kit is used as Calibrator A (Conc. 0 KIU/L).
ALLERgen Specific IgE Control Sera  ALLERgen Specific IgE Positive Control Serum - Inhalants: Positive for D1, E1, E5, G2, G6, T3, T7, W1, W6
ALLERgen Specific IgE Positive Control Serum - Foods: Positive for F1, F2, F4, F13
ALLERgen Specific IgE Negative Control Serum: Negative for D1, D2, E1, E5, G2, G6, M2, M5, T3, T7, W1, W6, F1, F2, F3, F13
applicantName: 大陳生物科技股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 臺北市松山區南京東路4段16號11樓
efficacy: 用於偵測人類血清或血漿中過敏原特異性IgE。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: C.5510 免疫球蛋白A，G，M，D及E免疫試驗系統

factoryDtoList.factoryAddr: VIA LUIGI EINAUDI, 7-00012 GUIDONIA MONTECELIO (RM), ITALY
VIA CRISTONI, 12, 40033 CASALECCHIO DI RENO, BOLOGNA (BO), ITALY
